string.text: A voice from the north has called for you. Find the source.
The voice calling you must be from the Wish Granter. You should be able to find it somewhere in the sarcophagus.
Find the hidden Monolith base mentioned in the manuscript and discover what it's hiding.
Destroy the Wish Granter by defeating all 10 waves of conjured projections.
Disable the power supply generators of the C-Consciousness pods.
